item.description:
I will be unable to have a November meeting as my surgery schedule has been bumped to December 10th. I am looking to hold a meeting on Thursday, December 3rd at 7 PM.

I have applied for the Senior Center Lounge for our meeting (and all future meetings with luck) but have not heard back from them yet. This announcement is just a heads up as to when we will next be meeting. I will send a follow up message when the venue is set.

I would like to discuss the news about a viral/DNA marker that was found in Chronic Fatigue sufferers that was publicized two weeks ago and the possible ramification for Fibromyalgia afflictees. It is a possibility that we have such a marker as well. I think this is very significant information and I want to cover it.

Also as always bring your stories and support and any new information on treatments and techniques that you want to share with the group.

Stay tuned for an update on location for our next meeting and you can always e-mail me if you want to talk.

betsy
item.name: Reading Fibromyalgia Support Group Meetup
